content: these cheery woodland animals make a fun crib mobile and include a squirrel racoon fox hedgehog toadstool acorn and leaves this pattern incorporates intarsia colour-work and the squirrel uses a loop stitch you will also need to cast on and off knit purl work increases and decreases and sew seams all pieces are worked flat back and forth on the single pointed knitting needles not in the round the mobile is suspended on single_crochet chains worked on the crochet hook designed by amanda berry @fluffandfuzz the toys are knitted in acrylic 4 ply yarns although you can use dk double knitting/light worsted if you prefer **needles** a pair of 3 25mm single pointed knitting needles us 3 **recommended yarn** patons fairytale fab 4 ply sport/fingering weight 100% acrylic one 50g skein in each colour **notions** tapestry needle toy filling a 3 5mm crochet hook toy safety eyes and a 6 inch embroidery hoop to make the mobile **sizes** one size only - the fox squirrel and racoon are 13cm tall the hedgehog is 8cm long and the toadstool is 7cm tall **techniques** for confident beginners and above other techniques used include casting on and off knits purls increases and decreases and seaming to finish **pattern info** this knitting pattern is a pdf download 10 pages and written in english patterns for personal use only not for resale copyright © 2018 amanda berry all rights reserved
